Pilates

Transform your Body!

Welcome to Canons Pilates, the ultimate body conditioning regime which not only lengthens and strengthens muscles but improves flexibility, targets core muscles, and corrects posture.

Book now

My Story

My journey began 2 years ago when I was diagnosed with cervical stenosis, which is the degeneration of the cervical vertebrae due to poor posture and balancing causing discomfort and pain. Usually impacted whilst sitting and viewing computer, mobile and tv screens. My elderly mother has been impacted by a similar condition cervical scoliosis and kyphosis which a converged condition of the neck and caused also due to poor posture and balancing. After being referrals to qualified physiotherapists, who recommend home exercises which are not coordinated and can lead to further injury if not practiced correctly, I decided to attend Pilates classes for one year and thereafter qualify as a body-controlled Pilates teacher. This has been a life changing physical and mental health improvement for myself, mother, family, friends and can also for yourself. Please view the classes links on this site to see what we have to offer.
